data.text:
"When I think about you I end up having a stupid grin on my face!!!"

Hey guys ğŸ˜

Let's get into the storyğŸ¥°

ğŸŒ¸ğŸŒ¸ğŸŒ¸ğŸŒ¸ğŸŒ¸ğŸŒ¸

Siddaathvi hold their hands crossed the road reached metro station..

When they entered it is not crowded much but there is no place to sit..

Sid held the chain...aathvi can't..

It was in height...aathvi pouted

Sid looked at her and murmured " kuttachi"ğŸ¥°

Sid held the chain aathvi hold sid arm for balance..

( Tall boy short girl combo I am crazy about it ğŸ˜»)

Sid - hey kuttachi pathu pidichuko di vilundhura pora...

Aathvi had various feelings inside her..this is new to her...

Aathvi nodded hmm..ğŸ˜Š

Next station they got place to sit...

Aathvi sat in the corner seat...sid leave one seat between them and sat...

Aathvi mv - romba thanğŸ˜

A boy who was looking for a place to sit...found one empty seat near aathvi..he walked to sit near her..

Sid noticed this and immediately moved and sat near aathvi...

Sid -:Inga ukarunga bro...

That boy glarred himğŸ¤¨

Sid mv - poda poi anga ukaru oru gap iruka kodadhey udane vanthuruvanungağŸ˜

Aathvi - Dei idhuku first eh Inga ukkanthu irukalamğŸ¤­

Sid - first time vara so edho konjam freeya ukaruva nu nenachen..

Aathvi - Loosu

Sid - Sari vidu dii..adan ukantutan la...

Aathvi - hmm...innum evlo neram agum

Sid - Ipo thane di start panom innum konja neram agum..

Aathvi - paatu kepoma..

Sid - kelu di...

Aathvi - loosu she took her phone and airpods..

Sid - ayoo Enna inaiku airpod eduthu tu vara marantom...

Aathvi - Ena da illaya...

Sid - Maranten dii..

Aathvi hand overed one side airpods to him..." indha pidi "

Sid - Neeye kelu di..

Aathvi - kuni da ...she placed one of her airpods in his ear and played a song...

Both were enjoying the song...ğŸ¶

"Nee Yenadharuginil Nee

Idhai Vida Oru KavithaiKedaiyathe

Nee Yenadharuginil Nee

Idhai Vida Oru Punithamum Irukkathe!!!"

Both are drowned in each other eyes...Hidden blushes, small smile for the lyrics and bgm running in the bg...

La la la la la....ğŸ¶ğŸ¶

Suddenly both jerked because of train stopped in their station ğŸš†

Sid - Adhukulla vantoma time ponadhey therila..

Aathvi - ama la...

They came out of train..

Sid - Address paru cab podalama...
